intro: Nintendo Switch™ Exclusive! Face heart-pounding missions on chemical plant battlefields! Dominate hazardous zones with tanks and close combat!
description:
Immersive missions unfold in photorealistic chemical plant territories! A real-time heart rate monitor displayed in the lower right corner heightens combat tension. Set against dangerous nuclear fuel production zones, survey the entire battlefield from elevated positions among towering refinement columns and spherical storage tanks, executing strategic sniper strikes! Experience unprecedented realism with spectacular visual effects as tank shells impact the ground, sending plumes of dust skyward. Select your class from the refined character selection UI, hone your skills in Deathmatch, then advance to high-difficulty tank operation missions!

・Real-time animated heart rate monitor! Experience combat tension across the entire screen!
・Strategic gameplay from elevated spherical storage tanks and high vantage points overlooking chemical plant facilities!
・Overwhelming visual effects such as dust clouds from tank shell impacts deliver thrilling combat scenes!
・Refined character selection UI enables intuitive class selection and immediate battlefield deployment!
・Experience multiple tense missions set in the hazardous nuclear fuel production facility!
・Master the fundamentals in Deathmatch before tackling tank operation missions with dramatically escalating difficulty!
・Extensive testing and balance adjustments deliver even more exciting and thrilling stages!
・Enjoy three-dimensional tactical combat using the complex terrain of industrial facilities!
・Diverse game modes designed for both beginners and experts to enjoy!

Chemical plant territories materialize before you with cutting-edge photorealistic graphics. Tension etched by the heart rate monitor, dust clouds raised by tank bombardment, precision shooting from elevated positions. Experience unprecedented immersion in battlefields within hazardous nuclear fuel facilities! Conquer extreme combat as part of special forces in the ultimate hazardous zone FPS.

Synopsis
An arid wind whips up dust across desolate chemical plant territories. At the heart of massive refinement facility complexes, the next-generation nuclear fuel "Nucleon Core" radiates an ominous glow. The multinational military conglomerate "Northern Dynamics" deploys its armored division "Steel Punk" to seize control of this technology. Regions bristling with towering refinement columns and spherical nuclear fuel storage tanks swiftly transform into combat fortresses, as tank shell impacts shake the earth and spawn sandstorms.

The World Security Alliance responds urgently by dispatching the special intervention unit "Bullet Strike," comprising Assault, Support, Engineer, and Recon operatives. You enter the battlefield as part of this elite team, equipped with a real-time heart rate monitor, deployed to chemical plant war zones.

Survey the tactical situation from elevated chemical plant storage tanks and suppress enemies through sniper fire. Board tanks to devastate enemy positions with 120mm main guns, with impacts hurling dust and earth high into the sky. Alternatively, shoulder an RPG-7 to obliterate steel tanks in a single strike. Hone your techniques in Deathmatch before tackling ultra-high difficulty tank operation missions! In extreme conditions where your heart rate reaches its limit, secure Bullet Strike's victory!
